page.title: 12WOODS continued M.R/Croxton
page.content:
Ref 1207 CAMP COVERT 80 % Broadleaves Ash,Beech,Birch Sycamore + Oak. 20 % Softwoods Euro.+ Hybrid Larch Corsican + Scots Av. Age 60 years Pine Norway Spruce
Ref 1106 MELTON HIGH WOOD New mixed plantation near Melton H.W.. 70 % Broadleaves Ash,Sweet Chestnut, Sycamore. 30 % Softwood European Larch and Age 6_7 years Scots Pine Mature trees in hedgerows Ash & Oak.
New mixed plantation near Hall Farm on the edge of chalk quarry planted as a shelter belt. All forest areas above are of mixed plantations known as High Forest. They are planted for game cover, hunt- ing,shelter belts and timber.
